Title: Authorizes certain continuing education courses to be completed online
Summary: Authorizes continuing education courses for hearing aid dispensers and home inspectors to be completed online.
LawCode: Amd §§794 & 791, Gen Bus L; add §444-r, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the real property law, in relation to authorizing certain continuing education courses to be completed online
